segments.text: I see the woman standing at the sink, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate with such care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window lets in daylight, brightening the whole room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I spot the overflowâ€”water pouring out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flooding the floor, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What kind of absent-mindedness is this?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are at the cabinet, boy on the stool reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in his grasp, looking so pleased.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool's about to give way, it's terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's anticipating her cookie, eyes wide with excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're in cahoots, sneaky little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is serene, mocking the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
